drivers

Class Driver

  • java.lang.Object
    • drivers.Driver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DriverControladorConsultes, DriverControladorMultigraf, DriverExportacio, DriverHeteSim, DriverPair, DriverPersistencia, DriverPersistenciaPropi, DriverResultat, DriverThreshold, Test

    public abstract class Driver
extends java.lang.Object
    Classe per testos amb utilitats per escriure i demanar dades.
    Author:
    Carlos Lazaro
